com.bumptech.glide.loader.image
Class ImageManagerLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.loader.image.ImageManagerLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageLoader
public class ImageManagerLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageLoader

A base class for loaders that user ImageManager. Primarily responsible for keeping track of bitmaps for recycling purposes.

Method Detail

fetchImage

public java.lang.Object fetchImage(java.lang.String id,
                                   StreamLoader streamLoader,
                                   Transformation transformation,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   ImageLoader.ImageReadyCallback cb)
Description copied from interface: ImageLoader
Load the image at the given path represented by the given model

Specified by:
fetchImage in interface ImageLoader
Parameters:
id - A string id that uniquely identifies the image to be loaded. It may include the width and height, but is not required to do so
streamLoader - The StreamLoader that will be used to load the image if it is not cached
width - The width of the view where the image will be displayed
height - The height of the view where the image will be displayed
cb - The callback to call when the bitmap is loaded into memory, or when a load fails
Returns:
A reference to the fetch that must be retained by the calling object as long as the fetch is relevant

protected void onImageReady(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                            boolean isUsed)

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from interface: ImageLoader
Called when the current image load does not need to continue and any corresponding cleanup to save cpu or memory can be done. Will not be called if a load completes successfully.

Specified by:
clear in interface ImageLoader
